mainHero.title: Be a Local Expert
mainHero.subtitle: Make Money Using Your Skills
mainHero.description: Make money and help your neighbors at the same time. From tutoring, IT, design, catering, and more, make money using your skills.

sections.title: Turn Your Skills Into Income
sections.description: Whether you're a tutor, IT specialist, designer, cleaner, or caterer - your skills are valuable. Join our platform to connect with local clients who need your expertise and start earning money doing what you do best.

sections.title: You Set The Terms
sections.description: You're in control of your business. Set your own rates, choose which jobs to bid on, and work when it suits you. Build your reputation through reviews and grow your local client base on your terms.

features.title: Services We Offer
features.subtitle: Expert help for every need
features.description: Our platform connects you with local experts across a wide range of services. From academic tutoring to professional services, home maintenance to creative projects - find the right expert for any task.

items.name: Education
items.description: Connect with qualified tutors for subjects ranging from math and science to music and languages.

items.name: Home Services
items.description: Find reliable experts for moving, cleaning, repairs, and maintenance work in your area.

items.name: Professional
items.description: Access IT support, design services, and other professional expertise from local specialists.

items.name: Events
items.description: Discover local caterers, photographers, and event planners for your special occasions.

sections.name: For Clients
sections.content: Post your task and get matched with qualified local experts. Compare bids, reviews, and expertise to find the perfect match for your needs. Our platform ensures secure payments and satisfaction guarantee.

sections.name: For Experts
sections.content: Share your expertise and grow your local client base. Set your own rates, choose your schedule, and build your professional reputation through our trusted platform.

sections.name: Our Mission
sections.content: We're building a community where local expertise meets local needs. Our platform makes it easy to find qualified help for any task while creating opportunities for skilled professionals in your neighborhood.

sections.name: Trust & Safety
sections.content: Every expert on our platform is verified and reviewed. We provide secure payments, insurance coverage, and dispute resolution to ensure a safe and reliable experience for everyone.
